title: The Last Adventure
description: An epic adventure movie about a group of explorers searching for a lost city in the Amazon.

title: Galactic Odyssey
description: A space exploration movie set in the year 2150, featuring intergalactic travel and alien encounters.

title: Midnight in Paris
description: A romantic comedy about a writer who finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every night at midnight.

title: The Last Stand
description: A retired sheriff must organize a ragtag team to take down a drug cartel leader at the US-Mexico border.

title: Eternal Sunshine
description: A psychological drama exploring the boundaries of memory and love through a groundbreaking medical procedure.
